aircraft.value: Phoenix Recon - AC-7027-244 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Fuel control unit drift. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 02/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 05/04/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 07/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 07/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 08/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel control unit drift. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
